column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute is definitely the jewel in the crown of Chicago museums
column2: and is a world-class art museum. It is most famous for its outstanding collections of Impressionists (including important paintings by Monet
column5: etc.) and of American art (Edward Hopper's Nighthawks
column6: for example). The Art Institute has lots of other interesting things
column9: and The Thorne Minature Rooms: 68 minature rooms showing European interiors from the late 13th century to the 1930s and American furnishings from the 17th century to the 1930s. Very cool
